original_text: But when Israel's people were in the wilderness, they turned against me. They did not obey my laws or my commands. (But anyone who did obey them would enjoy a good life.) They did not obey my rules for Sabbath days. So I was very angry with them. I decided to destroy them there in the wilderness.
korean_text: 그러나 이스라엘 족속이 광야에서 내게 반역하여 사람이 준행하면 그로 말미암아 삶을 얻을 나의 율례를 준행하지 아니하며 나의 규례를 멸시하였고 나의 안식일을 크게 더럽혔으므로 내가 이르기를 내가 내 분노를 광야에서 그들에게 쏟아 멸하리라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: But when Israel's people were in the wilderness
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이스라엘 백성이 광야에 있을 때

sentences.original_text: They did not obey my laws
But anyone who did obey them would enjoy a good life
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것들을 순종하는 사람은 좋은 삶을 즐길 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They did not obey my rules for Sabbath days
So I was very angry with them
I decided to destroy them there in the wilderness
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 그 광야에서 멸망시키기로 결정했습니다
